WorkItem.Description:
I'm using D3 in a wpf xbap application. So far I think its great thank you.
 
My xbap crashed when I tried to right click to open my context menu. I found a solution here:
 
http://khason.net/blog/quick-tip-how-to-open-popup-or-contextmenu-in-xbap-application/
 
I put a single-line fix in the  plotter_PreviewMouseRightButtonUp method inside the DefaultContextMenu.cs class as follows:
 
        plotter.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget = sender as UIElement; // new line
	    plotter.ContextMenu.IsOpen = true;                         // existing line
 
 
Would it be appropriate for you to include that in your builds?
WorkItem.Summary: Context Menu crashing in xbap application
